name: Chapter 2 Granny
description:
If you want to have a scary time, play Granny chapter V1.7: Horror game 2019 now and try to escape from the horror house

You must find the escape route from the Granny house, you will have to use all the tools that you have at your hand to complete the puzzle and unlock doors finding the key hidden somewhere in structure that will help you get out of here.

Be quiet and careful because the Granny hears everything. She set traps by herself for her unexpected guests. You have only 5 days to get out of her house.

Key Features in new version Granny chapter two:
- Fearful and tension atmosphere
- Smooth and easy controls
- Many new exciting features
- Horror sound
- 3D graphics
- The best horror game 2019


Good luck
